help-file.title: "FLAME REAVER"
help-file.content:
The Flame Reaver has mastered the use of fire and it shows in their abilities. They gain the power to shroud themselves in fire and to unleash fireballs by drawing upon the power of their flaming swords. They may also tap into the fiery shroud surrounding them to send out waves of incendiary gates at their opponents, though this will drain the shroud until it finally will dissipate.
Innate Abilities --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 31st level: Immolate
Spells --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 7th circle: Fireshield
